channel.title: BBC Middle East
channel.description: Feed from BBC Middle East - with images and summaries

item.title: Iran students stage first large anti-government protests since deadly crackdown
item.description:
Student protesters honoured thousands of those killed when nationwide mass protests were put down by Iranian authorities last month.

item.title: US ambassador's Israel comments condemned by Arab and Muslim nations
item.description:
Mike Huckabee suggested Israel would be justified in taking much of the Middle East on Biblical grounds.

item.title: Palestinian Authority in dire straits as Israel's hold on West Bank deepens
item.description:
More than 30 years after its creation, there are increasing warnings that the PA is close to collapse.

item.title: Israeli strikes kill at least 10 in Lebanon, officials say
item.description:
The strikes are among the deadliest in Lebanon since a ceasefire ended the war between Israel and Hezbollah.

item.title: Family of Palestinian-American man killed in West Bank demand accountability
item.description:
Nasrallah Abu Siyam was the sixth American citizen killed by Israeli settlers or soldiers in the West Bank in the last two years.
